content.raw:
Just a minor note: dartsim should guarantee that every valid BodyNode should have a valid parent joint, so we shouldn’t need to test that here.

If we want to audit the assumption that every BodyNode has a valid parent joint, I would recommend putting `assert(childsParentJoint);` before these if-statements instead. If that test ever fails, then there’s a serious bug in dartsim or in our use of dartsim.
